data.name: DOA5LR Arc System Works Mashup Set
data.detailed_description:
Dream collaboration with the creator of classy fighting games - Arc System Works!

Crossing the game worlds, costumes from popular characters of the "GUILTY GEAR" and "BLAZBLUE" series will appear in DEAD OR ALIVE!
Dress up and cut the path to your destiny with your own hands!

The Arc System Works Mashup Set for characters of DOA5LR!
A set of 16 costumes for 16 characters.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Marie Rose, Honoka, Nyotengu, Phase 4, Hitomi, Leifang, Momiji, Rachel, Christie, Kokoro, Helena, Tina, Lisa and Mila.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must own the relevant characters to be able to use this content.

data.short_description: This is a value set of costumes based on outfits from classy fighting games from Arc System Works! A set of 16 costumes for 16 characters.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
